trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls that display their data in hierarchical form.
trans-unit.target: Fungerer som basisklasse for alle ASP.NET versjon 2.0 databundet kontroller som viser dataene sine hierarki.

trans-unit.source: The HierarchicalDataBoundControl class is the base class used for ASP.NET controls that retrieve data from an ASP.NET hierarchical data source control and bind user-interface elements of the control to that data for display.
trans-unit.target: Klassen HierarchicalDataBoundControl er basisklasse brukes for ASP.NET-kontroller som hente data fra en ASP.NET hierarkisk datakildekontroll og bind elementer i brukergrensesnittet for kontrollen for at dataene for visning.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> classes derive from HierarchicalDataBoundControl.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>klasser som er avledet fra HierarchicalDataBoundControl.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Page developers do not use the HierarchicalDataBoundControl class directly; instead, they use controls that derive from this class.
trans-unit.target: Siden utviklere bruker ikke klassen HierarchicalDataBoundControl direkte. i stedet bruke de kontrollene som er avledet fra denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: Controls developers extend this class to create data-bound controls that work with classes that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface and classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> classes.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller utviklere utvide denne klassen for å opprette databundet Kontroller samarbeider med klasser som implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>grensesnittet og klasser som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>og <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>klasser.</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>

trans-unit.source: When deriving a class from the HierarchicalDataBoundControl class, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method to bind the user-interface elements of your control to data retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Når det avledes en klasse fra klassen HierarchicalDataBoundControl, eller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>metode til å binde elementer i brukergrensesnittet for kontrollen til data som hentes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetData%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetData%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> method is the only method you will override in your derived class.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>metoden er den eneste du vil overstyre i den utledede klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: For ASP.NET 2.0 data-bound controls, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method is the equivalent of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method, and is called to bind data at run time.
trans-unit.target: For ASP.NET 2.0 databundet Kontroller den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>metoden tilsvarer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>metoden, og for å binde data på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetData%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>metodekall den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetData%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetData%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the control from which the data-bound control retrieves its list of data items.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir IDen for kontroll hvor databundet kontrollen henter fra listen over dataelementer.

trans-unit.source: The ID of a control that represents the data source from which the data-bound control retrieves its data.
trans-unit.target: IDen for en kontroll som representerer datakilden som databundet kontrollen henter dataene.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Standard er <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref> object that the data-bound control uses to perform data operations.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView"> </xref> objekt som databundet kontrollen bruker til å utføre dataoperasjoner.

trans-unit.source: The GetData method retrieves a <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> object from the associated data source control by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetDataSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: GetData-metoden henter en <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>objektet fra de tilknyttede dataene kontrollen ved å kalle den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetDataSource%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetDataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: The hierarchical path of the view to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Hierarkisk banen i visningen for å hente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref> object that the data-bound control uses to perform data operations.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView"> </xref> objekt som databundet kontrollen bruker til å utføre dataoperasjoner.

trans-unit.source: A could not be retrieved for the specified viewPath.
trans-unit.target: En kan ikke hente for det angitte viewPath .

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource"></xref> that the data-bound control is associated with, if any.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource"> </xref> som databundet kontrollen er tilknyttet, hvis noen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetData%2A> method calls the GetDataSource method internally.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetData%2A>metodekall metoden getdatasource som er internt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetData%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource"></xref> instance that represents the data source identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*> property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource"> </xref> -forekomst som representerer datakilden som er identifisert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the state of the control in view state as successfully bound to data.
trans-unit.target: Angir tilstanden for kontrollen i visningen tilstand som er bundet til data.

trans-unit.source: The data-bound control maintains a value in view state that indicates whether it is currently bound to data.
trans-unit.target: Databundet kontrollen opprettholder en verdi i visningsstatusen som angir om den for øyeblikket er bundet til data.

trans-unit.source: The MarkAsDataBound method sets the value to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden MarkAsDataBound angir verdien til `true`.

trans-unit.source: Called when one of the base data source identification properties is changed, to re-bind the data-bound control to its data.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når en grunnleggende-identifikasjon av egenskapene for datakilde endres, til å binde databundet kontrollen til dataene.

trans-unit.source: The OnDataPropertyChanged method is called when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> is changed any time after the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDataPropertyChanged kalles når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>endres når du har sidens <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource"></xref> instance that the data-bound control works with raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource.DataSourceChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource"> </xref> -forekomst som databundet kontrollen fungerer med hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource.DataSourceChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.DataSourceChanged> event to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>klasse håndtak i <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.DataSourceChanged>-hendelsen for å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.DataSourceChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: The source of the event, the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for hendelsen, den <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>objekt som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Behandler den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> handles the Load event to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true` if the HTTP request is not a postback.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>behandler innlastingshendelse til å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>egenskapen `true` Hvis HTTP-forespørselen ikke er en tilbakesending.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>objekt som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.
trans-unit.target: Angir initialisert kontrollens databundet før kontrollen lastes.

trans-unit.source: The OnPagePreLoad sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true` in cases where the HTTP request is a postback and view state is enabled but the data-bound control has not yet been bound.
trans-unit.target: OnPagePreLoad angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>egenskapen `true` i tilfeller der HTTP-forespørselen er en tilbakesending og visningsstatusen er aktivert, men kontrollen databundet ennå ikke er bundet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: This scenario is common with controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> where the visibility of the control is changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: Dette scenarioet som er felles med kontroller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>der synligheten for kontrollen er endret på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"> </xref> som hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, binds data from the data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, binding data fra datakilden til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Implement this method instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method when you derive a data-bound control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Implementer denne metoden i stedet for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>metoden når du avledet en databundet kontroll fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: Placing your control's data-binding logic in PerformDataBinding keeps the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound> events from being raised in the wrong order.
trans-unit.target: Å sette inn kontrollen databinding logic i PerformDataBinding beholder den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound>hendelser fra blir opphøyd i feil rekkefølge.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>

trans-unit.source: While the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class provides no specific implementation for this method, the PerformDataBinding method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method to bind the values of any user interface controls to the data that is retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Da grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>klassen gir ingen bestemt implementering for denne metoden, metoden PerformDataBinding kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>metode til å binde verdiene i en kontroller for brukergrensesnitt til data som hentes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data from the associated data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter data fra den tilknyttede datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The PerformSelect method is called, after data is retrieved, to bind data to elements of the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden PerformSelect kalles etter data som hentes, for å binde data til elementer i databindingselementer-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Derived types override this method to retrieve data only if the default implementation is not adequate.
trans-unit.target: Avledede typer overstyre denne metoden for å hente data om standard implementering ikke er tilstrekkelig.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the object a data-bound control binds to is one it can work with.
trans-unit.target: Bekrefter at objektet en databundet kontroll binding til en de fungerer med.

trans-unit.source: The ValidateDataSource method is called only in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl> class's mutator (setter) for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ValidateDataSource kalles bare i det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>klassens mutator (aksesamlingen) for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class checks the type of the object that is set for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property to ensure that it is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> or <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>klassen kontrollerer typen for objektet som er angitt for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>til å sikre at den er en forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>grensesnitt.</xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: An object set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som er satt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: dataSource is not and implements neither the nor the interface.
trans-unit.target: dataSourceer ikke og implementerer verken den eller grensesnitt.
